text: Battle of Warsaw 1920 () is a 2011 Polish historical movie directed by Jerzy Hoffman and starring Daniel Olbrychski, Borys Szyc, Andrzej Strzelecki, Ewa Wiśniewska, Olga Kabo, Adam Ferency, Jacek Poniedziałek, Wiktor Zborowski, Wojciech Pszoniak. ==Other websites== * Category:2011 movies Category:2010s war movies Category:Polish movies Category:Movies directed by Jerzy Hoffman
title: Battle of Warsaw 1920
